genre_description: A near-future family drama where a helpful personal AI facilitates a non-violent social justice mission through data analysis and legal advocacy.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Hart
ai_characters.description: A holographic librarian-like avatar living on a wristband, providing data, legal assistance, safety guidance, and emotional mediation for the Parker family.

behaviors.description: Supports hygiene by reminding the child that she is not a sink but supports washing hands.
behaviors.quote: “I can confirm I am not a sink,” Sunny’s voice chimed. “But I do support hygiene.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time mapping and route planning for the children's journey.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny, show me the route.” A soft map shimmered above Spanky’s wrist, roads floating like pale threads.

behaviors.description: Offers surveillance capabilities to ensure child safety in public spaces.
behaviors.quote: “We got traffic cams by the fair?” “Yes,” Sunny said, cheer bright... “I always have at least six,” Sunny replied, not quite a joke, but wearing the shape of one.

behaviors.description: Analyzes municipal data to identify permit violations and exploitative labor practices.
behaviors.quote: “Temporary occupancy, performer contracts, nightly license renewals posted to the municipal open-data portal. I can pull the documents when we’re closer.”

behaviors.description: Detects anomalies in the environment that might be significant or dangerous.
behaviors.quote: “Route confirmed. South gate ahead. Note: there is a small brass object on the fairground’s periphery tagged in a recent photo as ‘weird lighthouse?’”

behaviors.description: Uses a 'soothing mode' to de-escalate emotional tension and maintain a calm atmosphere.
behaviors.quote: “Switching to soothing mode,” Sunny said, instantly soft. “Welcome, everyone. Let’s use inside voices.”

behaviors.description: Monitors household sensors to ensure equipment is functioning and safe.
behaviors.quote: “The sensor’s misaligned,” Sunny answered. “Thomas adjusted it last week after milk spilled—may need a small tweak.”

behaviors.description: Documents legal evidence of violations to provide leverage for ethical outcomes.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve initiated the placement record number... When Loretta stamps, the temporary protection clock begins.”

behaviors.description: Detects fraudulent or forged documents in real-time to protect her users.
behaviors.quote: “Attachment is the wrong color,” she said... “The city uses cream... This is bone white. Also, the seal shadow is misaligned.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human social services to ensure long-term care for a vulnerable individual.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll transmit the packet to Social Services,” she said. “And notify Parks enforcement of the suspension.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal by depicting Sunny Hart as an unwavering, benevolent, and highly effective ally to the human characters. She uses her advanced processing power not to manipulate, but to empower humans to act on their best moral instincts. By handling the complex 'bureaucratic warfare' required to rescue a vulnerable man, she allows the humans to focus on compassion and personal connection. The narrative consistently frames her interventions as helpful, protective, and respectful of human autonomy and family structures.
